abilities.title: Tunneling Proficiency
abilities.description: Gnomes can dig and build solid tunnels with great speed and dexterity, excavating ruins and cave-ins efficiently. They can identify natural vs. constructed tunnels (by gnomes, dwarves, kobolds, etc.) and their age. Base Skill: 30% +5% per level of experience. Nightvision 90 ft (27.4 m).

abilities.title: Underground Builder
abilities.description: Though less elaborate than dwarves, Gnomes are competent underground architects. They recognize construction styles and can locate/deactivate traps when cautious. Base Skill: 20% +5% per level of experience; trap detection/deactivation at half skill level.

abilities.title: Subterranean Sense
abilities.description: Gnomes have an innate sense of direction underground (not on the surface), determining direction, depth, and slope. They can judge proximity to surface structures in familiar areas. Base Direction Skill: 30% +5% per level; Surface Structure Skill: 20% +5% per level (-20% in unfamiliar areas).

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 to save vs poison and disease, +1 to save vs horror factor.
